6 class SecretSharerException : public LibCryptoSecException

8 public:

12  INTERNAL_ERROR,

19  this->errorCode = SecretSharerException::UNKNOWN;
20  }

25  }

31  virtual std::string toString() const
32  {
33  std::string ret;
34  if (this->errorCode == SecretSharerException::UNKNOWN)
35  {
36  ret = "SecretSharerException. Called by: " + this->where + ".";
37  }
38  else
39  {
40  ret = "SecretSharerException: " + SecretSharerException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Called by: " + this->where + ".";
41  }
42  return ret;
43  }
44  virtual SecretSharerException::ErrorCode getErrorCode()
45  {
46  return this->errorCode;
47  }
48  static std::string errorCode2Message(SecretSharerException::ErrorCode errorCode)
49  {
50  std::string ret;
51  switch (errorCode)
52  {
53  case SecretSharerException::UNKNOWN:
54  ret = "Unknown error";
55  break;
56  case SecretSharerException::INTERNAL_ERROR:
57  ret = "Internal error";
58  break;
59  case SecretSharerException::INVALID_THRESHOLD_VALUE:
60  ret = "Invalid threshold value";
61  break;
62  case SecretSharerException::INVALID_PARTS_VALUE:
63  ret = "Invalid parts value";
64  break;
65 // case ErrorCode:::
66 // ret = "";
67 // break;
68  }
69  return ret;
70  }
